definitions.definition: The ability to foresee or prepare wisely for the future .
examples: Having the foresight to prepare an evacuation plan may have saved their lives.

definitions.definition: The front sight on a rifle or similar weapon .
A bearing taken forwards towards a new object .

main_definition: The ability to foresee or prepare wisely for the future .
secondary_definitions: The front sight on a rifle or similar weapon .
( surveying ) A bearing taken forwards towards a new object .
